name: ViFit
description:
GET READY TO SWEAT

ViFit is the new VR Fitness game available for Oculus Quest!

Once you download ViFit get ready for some fun, motivating and epic fitness sessions in which you will get your heart pounding and body sweating.

Jabs, uppercuts, hooks, squats, sidesteps and many more movements that you will enjoy doing to complete your routines in all 360º directions.

You will have to put your full strength and precision into every movement you make to achieve your highest score and beat the community.

Features

  • 3 different difficulty levels
  • 4 different environments to choose from: from cyberpunk to nature.
  • Several types of obstacles: walls and lasers you must avoid and balls with punching directions you must destroy.
  • The harder you punch, the more points you get.

What there is to come

  • New training sessions every two weeks, for free! We listen to you and will design the best fitness sessions for you to enjoy.
  • New object designs. We are working on adapting our actual objects to fit into every environment, what do you think? We love your feedback!
